About the Company: Action Construction Equipment Limited is the leading mobile crane manufacturing company in India. In its endeavor to grow the business and offer quality products, the company has entered into series of marketing tie-ups with leading foreign companies like Autogru PM-Italy, Zoomlion-China, Maber-Italy, Tigieffe SRL-Italy, which facilitate the availability of latest technology and machines from around the world.They manufacture a variety of products like Hydraulic Mobile Pick-n-Move Cranes, Forklift Truck, Loaders including Front end loader,Tower cranes,Aerial Work Platforms, Mast Climbing Platforms / Lifts and Lorry Loaders / Truck Mounted Cranes..The company also engagged in the business of Cranes, Agri Equipment, Material Handling / Construction Equipment & Others.
